thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Sam Leonard
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Sam Leonard

author: Sam Leonard
title: Sam Leonard
text:
I used Upad to resign my tenants contracts, they were helpful in the transfer of the deposit and guided me through the mess of using my old high street agency that were difficult to work with.
Upad were super and i would use them again.
